TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MembershipPasswordFormat extends System.Enum

summary.span: 描述用于存储成员身份用户密码的加密格式。

span.span: Describes the encryption format for storing passwords for membership users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持不同的密码存储格式，但只应使用`Hashed`;`Clear`和`Encrypted`是不安全的。The class supports different password storage formats but you should only use `Hashed`; `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. 清除密码是不安全的并且不应使用。Clear passwords are not secure and shouldn't be used. 它们存储在纯文本。They are stored in plain text. 加密的密码被视为不安全，如受到破坏，可以显示出您的数据库的内容还可以公开的加密密钥。Encrypted passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 这意味着无法解密加密的密码，并将其公开。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. 存储，可以解密的密码比较或检索密码时，密码进行加密。Passwords are encrypted when stored and can be decrypted for password comparison or password retrieval. 使用单向加盐哈希存储在数据库时，经过哈希处理的密码进行加密。Hashed passwords are encrypted using a one-way salted hash when stored in the database. 密码验证时，它是与 salt 值结合使用，然后进行哈希处理。When a password is validated, it is combined with a salt value and then hashed. 结果验证的数据库中的值进行比较。The result is compared with the value in the database for verification. 无法检索经过哈希处理的密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[简介成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例并将其密码的格式设置为`Hashed`。It specifies the application's instance and sets its password format to `Hashed`. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat Clear = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat Encrypted = int32(2)

summary.span: 使用由 [machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) 的元素配置确定的加密设置对密码进行加密。

span.span: Passwords are encrypted using the encryption settings determined by the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat Hashed = int32(1)

summary.span: 使用 SHA1 哈希算法对密码进行单向加密。

span.span: Passwords are encrypted one-way using the SHA1 hashing algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定不同于 SHA1 算法使用哈希算法`hashAlgorithmType`属性。You can specify a hashing algorithm different than the SHA1 algorithm using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute.
